title: Draw :)
body: Riot i drawed you something, can you give me 50 rp for this?? Please,please!!

replies.body:
Jobb felső sarokban a támogatáson belül tudod felvenni velük a kapcsolatot. Átrakod magyarra, majd új kérvény.
Najó, ittvan [linkbe](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) is
Nice, send it to the support! It's a forum, and the hungarian one, we can't give you rp:)
